title: [BUG] Mlflow run error in multi process(Multi GPU) scenario
body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**:
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:Ubuntu VERSION="18.04.2 LTS (Bionic Beaver)"
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: 1.2.0
- **Python version**:  3.6

### Describe the problem

When I just use single GPU to run some mlflow like log_metrics it works fine. however, if I run in multi process multi GPU (like code below), there will be exception on some mlflow run already exists

```
File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 175, in log_param
    run_id = _get_or_start_run().info.run_id
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 416, in _get_or_start_run
    return start_run()
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 141, in start_run
    active_run_obj = MlflowClient().create_run(
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/client.py", line 32, in __init__
    self.store = utils._get_store(self.tracking_uri)
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/utils.py", line 145, in _get_store
    return _tracking_store_registry.get_store(store_uri, artifact_uri)
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/registry.py", line 65, in get_store
    return store_builder(store_uri=store_uri, artifact_uri=artifact_uri)
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/utils.py", line 91, in _get_file_store
    return FileStore(store_uri, store_uri)
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/store/file_store.py", line 101, in __init__
    mkdir(self.root_directory)
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/utils/file_utils.py", line 106, in mkdir
    raise e
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/utils/file_utils.py", line 103, in mkdir
    os.makedirs(target)
  File "/home/miniconda/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 220, in makedirs
    mkdir(name, mode)
FileExistsError: [Errno 17] File exists: '/home/zhrui/horizon_check/mlruns'
```


### Code to reproduce issue

The multi processes/Multi GPU example code is like

```
        multiprocessing.spawn(
            single_process_main, nprocs=params["num_processes_per_node"], args=[params]
        )
```

where in `single_process_main` will have code to call `mlflow.log_metrics`
